description.displayText:
I interviewed Summerjoi for a housekeeping position to take care of our short-term rental apartment. She agreed to come to the apartment to take a look and see how the job would be. She also agreed to do the job for a couple of weeks to see how things would work out.

We were depending on Summerjoi and were already counting with her to do the job for a couple of weeks, but suddenly she ghosted out of thin air.

She caused us to waste our time, in addition to that, she asked me to send her a picture of my ID, I kindly sent her my ID, I regret now, since I'm starting to think she just wanted to commit some identity theft crime.

In summary, I DO NOT RECOMMEND to engage in any conversation or business with Summerjoi, I'm confident she is not dependable, punctual, and definitely not somebody that I would entrust my housekeeping, babysitting or pet care needs.
description.originalText:
I interviewed Summerjoi for a housekeeping position to take care of our short-term rental apartment. She agreed to come to the apartment to take a look and see how the job would be. She also agreed to do the job for a couple of weeks to see how things would work out.

We were depending on Summerjoi and were already counting with her to do the job for a couple of weeks, but suddenly she ghosted out of thin air.

She caused us to waste our time, in addition to that, she asked me to send her a picture of my ID, I kindly sent her my ID, I regret now, since I'm starting to think she just wanted to commit some identity theft crime.

In summary, I DO NOT RECOMMEND to engage in any conversation or business with Summerjoi, I'm confident she is not dependable, punctual, and definitely not somebody that I would entrust my housekeeping, babysitting or pet care needs.
